attributes.title: Terrible✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever made. I do not support this cheeto puff looking racist president✨🧡 I really tried to use this app but it kept glitching me to a screen with the cheeto looking corn hair president and honestly it just gave me bad vibes and i was not here for it😗✌🏼 I also forgot to mention that this app took 7 hours to download which did not surprise me because because Trump is slow at many things☺️ Anyways with trump as a pedophi-  I mean president he is absolute trash and has a very bad spray tan🤡

attributes.title: worst app EVER !!
attributes.review: so i thot that this would be an amazing app, because obviously anything and everything trump related is AMAZING🤤. pero when i opened it it kept on crashing. so i deleted it and reopened it and it started working. but i kept on getting these really weird porn adds pop up every couple of minutes. some of the videos were of oompa loompas and annoying oranges. i can see why they chose those videos but i still was very disappointed 😔

attributes.title: Get this app off of the app store!!!!
attributes.review: I’m huge Trump 2020 but this app is extremely inappropriate. Had high hopes and was excited for it to download. Took TWO DAYS to download and when I opened it requested my SSN. I put it in because I want to help Trump, then it took me to a site with very inappropriate content and I have many viruses on my phone I have to pay to get fixed. Not appropriate for children or families or anyone. Extremely frustrating. #settlingforbidenbecauseofthis

attributes.title: WOSRT ALBUM EVER
attributes.review: Omg I used to love Taylor Swift when I was little, the self titled album and fearless were absolutely amazing, even after red though her creativity and taste in lyrics went straight down, I mean the Blank space song makes me want to rip my ears out ugh. Why couldn't she have just stayed with county?! And this new lover album is the worst thing I've ever heard. With all that said I'm actually a big Swiftie and love every Taylor Swift album or ep she has ever made, even lover! Taylor Swift for president 2020! Screw Trump! <3

attributes.title: very disappointed
attributes.review: I was so disappointed when I got the app. It did not work for me and the widgets were inoperative. It was an awful experience to see low quality content and grammatical errors. I was appalled to see something so abhorrent I expected so much more. It has really changed my outlook on the quality and credibility of this app and other information regarding Trump’s administration. I would not be interested in downloading this app again.

attributes.title: Horrible ✨
attributes.review:
Ok I cannot express how much I encourage this message, DO NOT GET THIS APP! First of all, I thought this game was gonna be so fun, but when I opened it, it showed a picture of an orange? Also it took FOREVER to even swipe through the picture. Jeez it was so annoying. Also I think the orange was a sign of a racist figure, but for legal reasons I will not say who. All I gotta say is, this is a disgusting, no good app and I hope it gets deleted off the App Store. Ty if u listen to my feedback ✨

Ps
Please delete this

attributes.title: This app is horrible.
attributes.review: The notifications never pop up on my screen even though I set the settings to do so. The app is sending misinformation and is leaving me with questions about what is the truth. I didn’t know that an app could spread so many lies and that people can be so engrossed in learning complete garbage. It’s appalling to me how many people have the audacity to neglect the true forms of this app and speak highly of the information that is distributed. This app is a disgrace.

attributes.title: My experience 😉😌💅🏾
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app not only did it take more than 5 hours to download🙄. Every-time that I tried to click to open the app it would take me right out😒.Then when I tried again the next day my phone kept powering off🤨.I decided to try one last time when something popped up on my screen saying ‘We Know Where You Are!😈’😣Then it made my phone continuously glitch, I Got 14 DIFFERENT VIRUSES FROM THIS APP!!😡I Do NOT recommend this app!!😤😩

attributes.title: Terrible app don’t even bother downloading
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. nothing but horse porn, hitler fan fiction, and overpriced orange spray tan ☹️. annoying orange really let me down with this one not gonna lie, but then again he’s always let me down. i really hope apple takes all these reviews seriously because this app is a waste of internet space ! this app made me go blind and gave me hepatitis a, b, and c ! now my doctor bills are thru the roof ! pls remove this app it is a danger to us all !!!

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: This app is horrendous. Purely horrendous. I was not entirely sure if an app for Donald Trump’s campaign would have gained support from people who know how to use technology, and sure enough I was right. The lack of involvement and campaigning to young voters on an app designed to do so is hilarious. As I opened the app, I had to see Donald Trump’s face, something I wasn’t expecting and didn’t enjoy. I was then asked to give my number to support his cause. That was not it. Never hope to see this again.
